title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 14 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 14 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.
lineList.cn: 智慧妇人，建立家室。愚妄妇人，亲手拆毁。

lineList.en: He that walketh in his uprightness feareth the LORD: but he that is perverse in his ways despiseth him.
lineList.cn: 行动正直的，敬畏耶和华。乖僻的，却藐视他。

lineList.en: In the mouth of the foolish is a rod of pride: but the lips of the wise shall preserve them.
lineList.cn: 愚妄人口中骄傲，如杖责打己身。智慧人的嘴，必保守自己。

lineList.en: Where no oxen are, the crib is clean: but much increase is by the strength of the ox.
lineList.cn: 家里无牛，槽头乾净。土产加多，乃凭牛力。

lineList.en: A faithful witness will not lie: but a false witness will utter lies.
lineList.cn: 诚实见证人，不说谎话。假见证人，吐出谎言。

lineList.en: A scorner seeketh wisdom, and findeth it not: but knowledge is easy unto him that understandeth.
lineList.cn: 亵慢人寻智慧，却寻不着。聪明人易得知识。

lineList.en: Go from the presence of a foolish man, when thou perceivest not in him the lips of knowledge.
lineList.cn: 到愚昧人面前，不见他嘴中有知识。

lineList.en: The wisdom of the prudent is to understand his way: but the folly of fools is deceit.
lineList.cn: 通达人的智慧，在乎明白己道。愚昧人的愚妄，乃是诡诈。（或作自欺）

lineList.en: Fools make a mock at sin: but among the righteous there is favour.
lineList.cn: 愚妄人犯罪，以为戏耍。（或作赎愆祭愚弄愚妄人）正直人互相喜悦。

lineList.en: The heart knoweth his own bitterness; and a stranger doth not intermeddle with his joy.
lineList.cn: 心中的苦楚，自己知道。心里的喜乐，外人无干。

lineList.en: The house of the wicked shall be overthrown: but the tabernacle of the upright shall flourish.
lineList.cn: 奸恶人的房屋必倾倒。正直人的帐棚必兴盛。

lineList.en: There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.
lineList.cn: 有一条路人以为正。至终成为死亡之路。

lineList.en: Even in laughter the heart is sorrowful; and the end of that mirth is heaviness.
lineList.cn: 人在喜笑中，心也忧愁。快乐至极，就生愁苦。

lineList.en: The backslider in heart shall be filled with his own ways: and a good man shall be satisfied from himself.
lineList.cn: 心中背道的，必满得自己的结果。善人必从自己（的行为，得以知足）

lineList.en: The simple believeth every word: but the prudent man looketh well to his going.
lineList.cn: 愚蒙人是话都信。通达人处处谨慎。

lineList.en: A wise man feareth, and departeth from evil: but the fool rageth, and is confident.
lineList.cn: 智慧人惧怕，就远离恶事。愚妄人却狂傲自恃。

lineList.en: He that is soon angry dealeth foolishly: and a man of wicked devices is hated.
lineList.cn: 轻易发怒的，行事愚妄。设立诡计的，被人恨恶。

lineList.en: The simple inherit folly: but the prudent are crowned with knowledge.
lineList.cn: 愚蒙人得愚昧为产业。通达人得知识为冠冕。

lineList.en: The evil bow before the good; and the wicked at the gates of the righteous.
lineList.cn: 坏人俯伏在善人面前。恶人俯伏在义人门口。

lineList.en: The poor is hated even of his own neighbour: but the rich hath many friends.
lineList.cn: 贫穷人连邻舍也恨他。富足人朋友最多。

lineList.en: He that despiseth his neighbour sinneth: but he that hath mercy on the poor, happy is he.
lineList.cn: 藐视邻舍的，这人有罪。怜悯贫穷的，这人有福。

lineList.en: Do they not err that devise evil? but mercy and truth shall be to them that devise good.
lineList.cn: 谋恶的岂非走入迷途吗。谋善的必得慈爱和诚实。

lineList.en: In all labour there is profit: but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.
lineList.cn: 诸般勤劳，都有益处。嘴上多言，乃致穷乏。

lineList.en: The crown of the wise is their riches: but the foolishness of fools is folly.
lineList.cn: 智慧人的财，为自己的冠冕。愚妄人的愚昧，终是愚昧。

lineList.en: A true witness delivereth souls: but a deceitful witness speaketh lies.
lineList.cn: 作真见证的，救人性命。吐出谎言的，施行诡诈。

lineList.en: In the fear of the LORD is strong confidence: and his children shall have a place of refuge.
lineList.cn: 敬畏耶和华的，大有依靠。他的儿女，也有避难所。

lineList.en: The fear of the LORD is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.
lineList.cn: 敬畏耶和华，就是生命的泉源，可以使人离开死亡的网罗。

lineList.en: In the multitude of people is the king's honour: but in the want of people is the destruction of the prince.
lineList.cn: 帝王荣耀在乎民多。君王衰败在乎民少。

lineList.en: He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding: but he that is hasty of spirit exalteth folly.
lineList.cn: 不轻易发怒的，大有聪明。性情暴躁的，大显愚妄。

lineList.en: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.
lineList.cn: 心中安静，是肉体的生命。嫉妒是骨中的朽烂。

lineList.en: He that oppresseth the poor reproacheth his Maker: but he that honoureth him hath mercy on the poor.
lineList.cn: 欺压贫寒的，是辱没造他的主。怜悯穷乏的，乃是尊敬主

lineList.en: The wicked is driven away in his wickedness: but the righteous hath hope in his death.
lineList.cn: 恶人在所行的恶上，必被推倒。义人临死，有所投靠。

lineList.en: Wisdom resteth in the heart of him that hath understanding: but that which is in the midst of fools is made known.
lineList.cn: 智慧存在聪明人心中。愚昧人心里所存的，显而易见。

lineList.en: Righteousness exalteth a nation: but sin is a reproach to any people.
lineList.cn: 公义使邦国高举。罪恶是人民的羞辱。

lineList.en: The king's favour is toward a wise servant: but his wrath is against him that causeth shame.
lineList.cn: 智慧的臣子，蒙王恩惠。贻羞的仆人，遭其震怒。
